item.description:
Kreisler: Praeludium and Allegro
Beethoven: Spring Sonata
Ysaye: Solo Sonata No. 3, 'Ballade'
Saint-Saens: Introduction and Rondo Capriccioso

Latifah Hamzah '12, violin
Eileen Huang '05, piano

There will be a donation box at the concert with the proceeds going towards International Campaign for Justice in Bhopal (ICJB). Latifah has been an active volunteer for the cause and would love for you to contribute towards this noble organization.

Recommended Donation:$5 students, $10 general

The International Campaign for Justice for Bhopal (ICJB) is a coalition of disaster survivors and environmental, social justice, progressive Indian, and human rights groups that have joined forces to hold the Indian Government and Dow Chemical Corporation accountable for the ongoing chemical disaster in Bhopal, India. It was set up to address the grave injustices suffered by the half million Bhopal Gas Disaster survivors.

You can learn more about the organization and their struggle at
http://studentsforbhopal.org/ and
http://bhopal.net/

facebook : https://www.facebook.com/events/424659740883999/
item.name: Violin recital by Latifah Hamzah dedicated to Bhopal
